domain.update.contracts

Interface IObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBasicObserver
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IUpdateProcessor, IVisualizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionInput, CompositeAction, CompositeActionFly, CompositeActionFlyCatch, ForcedRemiseObserver, GameController, GraphicalVisualizer, InputProvider, OutOfMovesObserver, TextualVisualizer, UpdateProcessor, UpdatePropagator

    public interface IObserver
extends IBasicObserver
    Implementers can observe the IGame by receiving IBoard and status updates. As such, the methods below are typically dispatched by an external source. Instances typically subscribe to classes that implement IUpdateSource.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireAcceptRemise()
      Indicates that both Players agreed on remise.
      void fireDeclineRemise()
      Indicates that no agreement on remise was reached.
      void fireError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception ex)
      Indicates that something serious has happened that requires the Players to be notified.
      void fireForcedRemise()
      Indicates that a forced remise took place.
      void fireGameOver(Player winner)
      Indicates that the Game is over.
      void fireOutOfMoves(Player player)
      Indicates that the given player is out of moves.
      void firePromotion(IReadOnlyBoard board, Location location)
      Indicates that a promotable Piece has reached its promotion row.
      void fireProposeRemise(Player proposer)
      Indicates that given Player proposes remise.
      void fireResign(Player resignee)
      Indicates that the given Player has resigned.
      void fireStart(IReadOnlyBoard board, Player starter)
      Indicates that the Game has started.
      void fireWarning(java.lang.String message)
      Indicates that something has happened that requires the Players to be notified.

    • Method Detail

      • firePromotion

        void firePromotion(IReadOnlyBoard board,
                   Location location)
        Indicates that a promotable Piece has reached its promotion row.
        Parameters:
        board - The current Board after promotion.
        location - The location of the Piece to be promoted.

      • fireGameOver

        void fireGameOver(Player winner)
        Indicates that the Game is over.
        Parameters:
        winner - The winner of the Game. Can be null in case of remise.

      • fireOutOfMoves

        void fireOutOfMoves(Player player)
        Indicates that the given player is out of moves.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who cannot perform any more valid Action.

      • fireProposeRemise

        void fireProposeRemise(Player proposer)
        Indicates that given Player proposes remise.
        Parameters:
        proposer - The Player that proposes remise.

      • fireAcceptRemise

        void fireAcceptRemise()
        Indicates that both Players agreed on remise.

      • fireDeclineRemise

        void fireDeclineRemise()
        Indicates that no agreement on remise was reached.

      • fireForcedRemise

        void fireForcedRemise()
        Indicates that a forced remise took place.

      • fireResign

        void fireResign(Player resignee)
        Indicates that the given Player has resigned.
        Parameters:
        resignee - The Player who resigned.

      • fireStart

        void fireStart(IReadOnlyBoard board,
               Player starter)
        Indicates that the Game has started.
        Parameters:
        board - The initial Board.
        starter - The Player that plays first.

      • fireWarning

        void fireWarning(java.lang.String message)
        Indicates that something has happened that requires the Players to be notified.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to show to the Players.

      • fireError

        void fireError(java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.Exception ex)
        Indicates that something serious has happened that requires the Players to be notified.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to show to the Players.
        ex - The accompanying Exception.
